name: Clearance Level2
description:
Link to Clearance level 1 - https://vignesh-sk94.itch.io/clearance

Level 2 Solution 

** Rectangles of same colour lets you teleport between them. Press E in front of them to teleport.

** Black rectangles kill you. Avoid them.

**  Falling from height kills you

CONTROLS

1. Arrows to move

2. E to teleport using rectangles of same colour

3. Space to jump

4. Press space when in contact with wall to jump up (across).

5. Use arrows when in contact with wall to jump down (across).

OBJECTIVE

Cross the building to continue east.
